page.title: 05HOUSEHOLDS: LAVENHAM/ACTON
page.content: The part of Lavenham which lies within the block is composed of council and private housing in roughly equal pro- portions. The private houses are main- ly of detached executive type. There are also two very small private est- ates. The Council properties lie at the very edges of the village in two sepa- rate estates, one linear and one U-shaped. In the rural area, most pro- perties are farmhouses. All housing appears to be well-maintained. By estimating population at 2.5 per private dwelling and 3.5 per council dwelling, one arrives at a total of 316 and 420 respectively, giving a total population of 736 for the block. Car- ownership is almost a necessity because of the rural nature of the area.
